text: pproximate number of patients (when available) Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cough - Dyspnea - Pulmonary capillary hemangiomatosis - Pulmonary hypertension - Pulmonary venoocclusive disease - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
